Description: Pack of F to F headers for circuit connections
Pack of breakaway M and F pins for boards
IR sensor for lid safety interlock
200 Ohm trim potentiometer for LCD contrast
Barrel Jack adapter for power supply
Open-Source laser cut or 3D-printed frame components
Furniture bumpers to dampen vibrations on bottom of unit
PLA Filament for printing rotor and encoder knob (use 20% infill or higher)
3/16" Acrylic for frame pieces (purchase from local companies/stores for cheaper prices)
